Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera's for someone on a budget...
Reviews.Author: Drumbe
Reviews.Content: These cameras are excellent for the money you spend on them. And it my case, where night vision is of importance to me, this model of camera has definitely exceeded my expectation...I run 13 of these camera into a DVR by the same company, Q-SEE. With there HD video output, daylight camera views are very clear and crisp.Night time images, when the distant gets out to the outer areas of the cameras range are hard to make out. But in my case, I need about 30 feet of night vision and these do the job.Also, as mentioned in a comment... The Customer Service is on the money... There are not a 100%, I will say. But they are close to it...Highly recommend...

Reviews.Title: ALREADY CAUGHT A THIEF
Reviews.Author: gay reynolds
Reviews.Content: AWESOME ITEM IT DOES EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED AND WORKS REALLY WELL. IT HELPED MY NEIGHBOR I.D. THE GUY WHO STOLE HER CAR. IT REALLY DOES WHAT IT SAYS. I CAN SEE VERY WELL CLEAR ACROSS THE STREET IN TOTAL DARKNESS.

Reviews.Title: SOME OF THEIR NIGHT VISION SENSORS ARE TOO SENSITIVE AND HAVE INTERMITTENT PROBLEMS!!
Reviews.Author: A1 Computer Consulting "a1computerconsulting.com"
Reviews.Content: I bought six of these cameras and had them installed by a licensed electrician inside a large movie theater, to upgrade six 400 line cameras. They all worked correctly for a few days. But then the infrared LEDs on 4 of the 6 cameras started coming on intermittently with all of the lights turned on in the room, and turned their video to black and white. And a few cameras infrared LEDs always stayed on, so its video never turned to color, even with bright room lighting. The Electrician double checked the video cables, connectors and power input at each camera. And he said everything was what Q-SEE recommended. So I called Q-SEE and told them about this. They said the four cameras with problems may be defective. So they sent me 4 replacement cameras under warranty. But most of the replacement cameras have the same problem. So I am very unhappy!! And I want a full refund!!!

Reviews.Title: I dont like it
Reviews.Author: JORGE
Reviews.Content: camera works ok for two weeks an then image is white and black ,very poor quality ,I am trying to return the item,waiting for seller respond.

Reviews.Title: CCTV 480TV Line
Reviews.Author: Julian
Reviews.Content: I am not impress with this camI bought a cam that cost $20 {Zmodo CM-C22623BG ] that does a better job in the day light.the night vision is good but again the range is that great as marketed.

Reviews.Title: below my expectation!
Reviews.Author: Techman "destinpc"
Reviews.Content: The one i Received might be different as the picture compare to my 420 tvl by another company  is not much of a different. Will surely not buy this brand again. I will try the dome by qsee as this brand let me down.

Reviews.Title: Qsee QM 6050 Camera
Reviews.Author: Retired Tinsnips "uniontinknocker162"
Reviews.Content: I ended up getting a upgraded camera after they contacted me.. Got the 6050 model.. Within 2 days of my Amazon order.. Camera works great with a wide angle lens... Very happy with the free upgrade..

Reviews.Title: Worthy upgrade, on a budget.
Reviews.Author: Mal
Reviews.Content: I live in a pretty wooded area, and it gets pretty pitch dark at night. I currently have the very basic, cheap Zmodo PKD-DK40107 4Channel DVR 480TVL--which isn't too bad, but I just needed something with more night vision power. It was nice because I already BNC cables routed, so it was a simple swap with the old camera, screw in the new base plate and done. Very nice picture day and night. I've posted before and after pictures of the night image for you to see in the photo area. The camera itself feels very sturdy and well made as well.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for an analogue outdoor cam
Reviews.Author: The mother of all prduct reviews
Reviews.Content: I question the 600TVL on this. When I ordered this, I was actually sent the next model up at no extra charge, which was touted as 700TVL. My system only recognizes it as 540TVL.However, during the daytime, the image looks great. At night, it deteriorates. I would say the IR LED's reach out about 80 feet, not 120... although the night mode still picks up ambient light from further distances, but not enhanced by IR.Overall, I am satisfied with it. It has held up to cold/wind/rain/snow so far and I haven't had to touch it once since initial installation, so I can't complain for the price. The wider field of view was an unexpected touch that favored my application.

Reviews.Title: Q-See QM6006B delivered as advertised
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as an addition to my current cameras.  This is better than the cameras that came with my standard Qsee.  The picture is clearer at night and day and has a slightly bigger coverage. I do recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: William R. Barrett
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, brings a sigh of relief knowing that anyone coming to my door is now on camera.  I am confident that it will be a crime deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Awsome!!!
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: This camera is an add on to my system and the picture quality and clarity is awsome!!!  I would say 600 TV lines or more is the way to go!!!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Accutek
Reviews.Content: I purchased a package deal from Costco. It came with these cameras.I ran cat5e cables. I purchased a camera from Back Street 120NV 700TVL. Waste of money. Very poor image. The Q-see camers are 600TVL and yet much better image. The back street camera is much larger. Better mounting bracket then Q-see. Other than bracket, the q-see is much better for the money.Took off one star for the bracket. Night vison is good. 120 feet.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Clarity. Wish the lens had a little wider view
Reviews.Author: D. Morris "DM"
Reviews.Content: This camera has excellent day and night vision. My only gripe is that it doesn't have a very wide angle view. With a 5mm lens, it's perfect for an under the eves installation on a second or high first floor. But, any less than 10' off the ground doesn't provide much of a range of view. Having said that, if your application isn't too close to the ground, then this may be perfect for your situation.

Reviews.Title: LOUIE FROM FLORIDA
Reviews.Author: stirup
Reviews.Content: GOOD CAMERA, VERY  CLEAR PICTURE, AND DISTANCE. I WOULD BUY MORE OF THEM. THE SERVICE IS VERY GOOD, THE VENTOR RETURN E/MAILS,

Reviews.Title: much improved night vision.
Reviews.Author: M. Drenth "Tool guy"
Reviews.Content: I use this for security for my equipment, and the night vision is great.  I can see the writing on the clothing of people walking by in the middle of the night.

Reviews.Title: Camera works fine
Reviews.Author: Joyce Lee
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for a camera that broke and was not covered under warranty.  I was happy that the camera came with all of the required accessories needed to install it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect replacement
Reviews.Author: Lloyd Dawson
Reviews.Content: This unit was a replacement for a camera that failed due to water damage. The camera is much better then the one it replaced. Nice construction ( as always from Q-See ).

Reviews.Title: Great value for a surveillance camera.
Reviews.Author: Central Free Will Bapt
Reviews.Content: I only wish you could distinguish a license plate...other than that, it is a great value with decent resolution.  We have eight of them installed...

Reviews.Title: Good Security Camera
Reviews.Author: CM
Reviews.Content: Easy to install good transition from Daylight to night with IR.  Unit only comes with 50 foot cable.  Take advantage of ordering a 100 footer if needed.  Night time IR switches to Black and White.

Reviews.Title: Better than the cameras i had
Reviews.Author: stevizzle
Reviews.Content: I had the light cameras that came with my dvr so these are an improvement the colors are accurate and i get a wider angle of view but the video quality still isnt great i guess you have to spend alot to get a good clear picture. Also these cameras are larger then the ones i had but they seem to be of better quality.

Reviews.Title: Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera as a replacement.  Although this is a newer model and newer than the other cameras on my system, it seems to be clearer and will project farther at night than my existing cameras.  So far I'm pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I got a few of these to replace the 400 line / 40ft night vision cameras that came with my Q-See DVR.  It is a huge difference in quality both day and night.  The cameras are physically much bigger but not obtrusive and look very nice.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Camera reset problems
Reviews.Author: J. Gwinn "smiley"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera if you leave your system on. If you turn the system off, as i do at night, then this camera may require a "reset" in order for it to function properly.  It is not feasible to climb up a ladder each time and cover the camera lens to reset the camera each day.I definitely could not recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Customer support non-existent
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: I bought the Qt426 with eigth cameras. The cameras are good equipment.  I have 30 years tech experience. The instructions and customer support are extreamely poor.  Expect to spend hours and hours trying to get it set up.  I left a message and they didn't call back.

Reviews.Title: Night and day difference at night!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: On a pitch black patio with no light AT ALL, this camera lights it up like it is day outside! The quality of the camera is not a ton better quality then my original zmodo camera but the colors are better. I would really recommend this camera for the price! If you need a night vision camera this is the one!

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Karen Schumacher
Reviews.Content: Good picture quality.  Can not adjust camera position once it is mounted.  Good price for what you get.. Would reccomend if you don't need to adjust the camera angle.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: I needed to add an additional camera so this was perfect for what I needed!  Shipped fast too, very happy!

ProductInfo.Features:
High Resolution 600TVL
5mm Lens
42 LED's for 120 Foot Night Vision
Sony 1/3 " CCD with IR Cut Filter
60' Cable and Power Adapter with each Camera Purchase
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QM6006B Weatherproof I 600TV Line of Resolution I 120ft Night Vision
